pages.text: $(li)The Jungle is a humid climate composed of mostly of very big Jungle Trees, Leaves and Vines that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Here you can find vegetation like Bananas Bundles, Melons, Oak trees, Jungle trees, Cocoa, Poppies, Dandelions, Bird of Paradise and Vines.

$(li)Some animals like Leafcutter Ants, Plantain Spiders, Chimpanzees, Gorilas, Capuchin Monkeys, Hummingbirds, Cats and Ocelots can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Jungle$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
